verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> met <S%H6293>him<s%>.

And when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> saw <S%H7200>them<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, This is <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4264>host<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Thus shall you <S%H559>speak<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>; your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H1481>thus<s%>, I have stayed with <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, and stayed there until <S%H309>now<s%>:

And I have <S%H7794>oxen<s%>, and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H8198>womenservants<s%>: and I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%>, that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We <S%H935>came<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, and also he <S%H1980>comes<s%> to meet <S%H7125>you<s%>, and four <S%H3967>hundred<s%> men with <S%H376>him<s%>.

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and <S%H3334>distressed<s%>: and he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that was with <S%H6629>him<s%>, and the flocks, and <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>bands<s%>;

And <S%H559>said<s%>, If <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4264>company<s%>, and strikes <S%H5221>it<s%>, then the other <S%H4264>company<s%> which is <S%H7604>left<s%> shall <S%H6413>escape<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> which <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7725>me<s%>, Return unto your <S%H776>country<s%>, and to your <S%H4138>relatives<s%>, and I will deal well with <S%H3190>you<s%>

I am not worthy of the <S%H6994>least<s%> of all the <S%H2617>mercies<s%>, and of all the <S%H571>truth<s%>, which you have <S%H6213>shown<s%> unto your <S%H5650>servant<s%>; for with my <S%H4731>staff<s%> I passed <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; and now I am become <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>bands<s%>.

Deliver <S%H5337>me<s%>, I pray you from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H251>brother<s%>, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>: for I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H935>him<s%>, lest he will come and strike <S%H5221>me<s%>, and the <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And you <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3190>surely<s%> do you <S%H3190>good<s%>, and <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, which cannot be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And he <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there that same <S%H3915>night<s%>; and <S%H3947>took<s%> of that which <S%H935>came<s%> to his <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%> for <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>;
Two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> she <S%H5795>goats<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> he <S%H8495>goats<s%>, two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7353>ewes<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>,

<S%H7970>Thirty<s%> <S%H3243>milk<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> with their <S%H1121>colts<s%>, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> she <S%H860>donkeys<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5895>foals<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, every <S%H5739>herd<s%> by <S%H559>themselves<s%>; and said unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, Pass <S%H5674>over<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7305>space<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5739>herd<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> <S%H5739>herd<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7223>foremost<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When <S%H6215>Esau<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> meets <S%H6298>you<s%>, and asketh <S%H7592>you<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Whose are <S%H3212>you<s%>, and where go <S%H6440>you<s%>, and whose are these before you?

Then you shall <S%H559>say<s%>, They be your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s; it is a <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>: <S%H310>and<s%>, behold, also he is behind us.

And <S%H1571>so<s%> commanded <S%H6680>he<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%>, and all that <S%H1980>followed<s%> the <S%H5739>herds<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, On this <S%H1697>manner<s%> shall you <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, when you find <S%H4672>him<s%>.

And say <S%H559>you<s%> <S%H1571>moreover<s%>, <S%H5650>Behold<s%>, your servant <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is behind <S%H310>us<s%>. For he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3722>appease<s%> <S%H6440>him<s%> with the <S%H4503>present<s%> that <S%H1980>goeth<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>; what if he will <S%H5375>accept<s%> of <S%H6440>me<s%>.
So <S%H5674>went<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>: and himself <S%H3885>lodged<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H4264>company<s%>.

And he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>womenservants<s%>, and his <S%H6240>eleven<s%> <S%H3206>sons<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4569>ford<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>.
And he took <S%H3947>them<s%>, and sent them <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%>, and sent over that he <S%H5674>had<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H79>alone<s%>; and there wrestled a <S%H376>man<s%> with him until the <S%H5927>breaking<s%> of the <S%H7837>day<s%>.

And when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> not against <S%H5060>him<s%>, he touched the hollow of his <S%H3409>thigh<s%>; and the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H3409>thigh<s%> was out of <S%H3363>joint<s%>, as he wrestled with <S%H79>him<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me <S%H7971>go<s%>, for the <S%H7837>day<s%> <S%H5927>breaks<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not let you <S%H7971>go<s%>, <S%H518>except<s%> you bless <S%H1288>me<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8034>him<s%>, What is your name? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H559>called<s%> no more <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, but <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for as a prince have you <S%H8280>power<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%> and with <S%H582>men<s%>, and have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H8034>me<s%>, I pray you your name. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Why is <S%H2088>it<s%> that you do <S%H7592>ask<s%> after my <S%H8034>name<s%>? And he blessed him <S%H1288>there<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6439>Peniel<s%>: for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>, and my <S%H5315>life<s%> is <S%H5337>preserved<s%>.
And as he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rose<s%> upon <S%H6760>him<s%>, and he limped upon his <S%H3409>thigh<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> not of the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> which <S%H5384>shrank<s%>, which is upon the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of the <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>: because he <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H3409>thigh<s%> in the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> that <S%H5384>shrank<s%>.
